  • Method Details

    • register

      String register(Student student, List<String> courses)
      Registers a student for a list of courses.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student registering for courses.
      courses - A `List` containing the IDs of the courses the student wishes to register for.
      Returns:
      A `String` message indicating the result of the registration operation (e.g., success or failure).

    • getValidCount

      int getValidCount(List<String> courses)
      Counts the number of valid courses from a list of course IDs.
      Parameters:
      courses - A `List` containing course IDs to be validated.
      Returns:
      An `int` representing the number of valid courses from the list.

    • viewCoursesEnrolled

      String viewCoursesEnrolled(Student student)
      Retrieves a list of courses that the student is currently enrolled in.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student whose enrolled courses are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `String` representation of the list of courses the student is enrolled in.

    • getReport

      String getReport(Student student)
      Retrieves the report card for a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student whose report card is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `String` representation of the student's report card.

    • getBillingInfo

      String getBillingInfo(Student student)
      Retrieves billing information for a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object representing the student whose billing information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `String` representation of the student's billing information.

    • viewCourses

      String viewCourses()
      Retrieves a list of all available courses.
      Returns:
      A `String` representation of the list of available courses.

    • makePayment

      String makePayment(Student student, float amount, String transactionID)
      Processes a payment for a student.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object making the payment.
      amount - The amount to be paid.
      transactionID - The ID of the payment transaction.
      Returns:
      A `String` message indicating the result of the payment operation (e.g., success or failure).

    • getCoursePricing

      float getCoursePricing(Student student)
      Retrieves the pricing information for the courses that the student is enrolled in.
      Parameters:
      student - The `Student` object for which the course pricing is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `float` representing the total price of the courses the student is enrolled in.
